The RTX 4070 Super and RTX 4070 Ti Super represent a much-needed redemption arc for the RTX 40 series. While Ada is no doubt incredibly powerful, the pricing has alienated many. By offering increased performance without bumping the rates up, these cards are now more capable and befitting of their respective pricing, more so than back in 2022. The Nvidia RTX 4070 Ti Super starts at $799 / £769 as the recommended price by Nvidia. However, it will be up to the partners to keep these rates consistent with their respective models. From what we’ve seen of Nvidia’s benchmarks, yes, the RTX 4070 Ti Super appears to be better than the RTX 4070 Super. From a technical perspective, the former is built on a larger AD103 die with 16GB GDDR6X memory, just like the RTX 4080.
